newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Morgan and partners get $2.4 mln Manila deal.
newsitem.headline: Morgan and partners get $2.4 mln Manila deal.

text.p: The Philippine National Oil Co said on Thursday it has chosen a Morgan Stanley Asia Ltd.-led group as the privatisation advisor to its geothermal subsidiary, PNOC-Energy Development Corp.

Energy Minister and PNOC chairman Francisco Viray told reporters the PNOC board approved on Wednesday the award of a $2.4 million contract to Morgan Stanley and its partners, Land Bank of the Philippines and the Development Bank of the Philippines.
Viray said the group will develop a privatisation strategy for PNOC-EDC over an eight month period starting in October.
Morgan Stanley is a unit of the Morgan Stanley Group Inc.
